description: Numbers n such that the decimal expansion of 8^n contains no zeros (probably finite).
comments: Integers in A007377 / 3. - _M. F. Hasler_, Mar 07 2014
prog: (PARI) for(n=0, 99, vecmin(digits(8^n))&& print1(n", ")) \\ _M. F. Hasler_, Mar 07 2014(MAGMA) [n: n in [0..500] | not 0 in Intseq(8^n)]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Mar 08 2014
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
extensions: Several edits (offset 1, initial 0, title rephrased) by _M. F. Hasler_, Mar 07 2014
